Pre-Game Insights: India are expected to rely on Suryakumar Yadav to steer them out of a wobble
There's growing pressure on Shivam Dube to come good as the spin enforcer
Bangladesh have an attack with variety, and two trump cards in Mustafizur Rahman and the legspinner Rishad Hossain
Bangladesh's batters have rarely given them any sort of cushion so far in the tournament
India are deriving the joys of having a fully-fit Hardik Pandya giving them the flexibility needed to play either a third seamer or a third spinner in Kuldeep Yadav
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be played at the Sir Vivian Richards Stadium in Antigua
Others: India won the match by 50 runs with a score of 196/5 against Bangladesh's 146/8
The match was part of the Super Eights, Group 1 of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024
